20110118025409.000|20110118025411.000|CC1|        and stay asleep,        
20110118025411.000|20110118025411.000|CC1|           so you can           
20110118025411.000|20110118025414.000|CC1|     wake up feeling rested.    
20110118025414.000|20110118025414.000|CC1|When taking Lunesta, don't drive
20110118025414.000|20110118025417.000|CC1|      or operate machinery      
20110118025417.000|20110118025419.000|CC1|   until you feel fully awake.  
20110118025419.000|20110118025419.000|CC1|    Walking, eating, driving,   
20110118025419.000|20110118025422.000|CC1| or engaging in other activities
20110118025422.000|20110118025422.000|CC1|      while asleep, without     
20110118025422.000|20110118025424.000|CC1|  remembering it the next day,  
20110118025424.000|20110118025426.000|CC1|       have been reported.      
20110118025426.000|20110118025426.000|CC1| Abnormal behaviors may include 
20110118025426.000|20110118025428.000|CC1|   aggressiveness, agitation,   
20110118025428.000|20110118025430.000|CC1|  hallucinations or confusion.

20110118025430.000|20110118025432.000|CC1|    worsening of depression,    
20110118025432.000|20110118025432.000|CC1|   including risk of suicide,   
20110118025432.000|20110118025434.000|CC1|           may occur.

20110118025434.000|20110118025436.000|CC1|      increase these risks.     
20110118025436.000|20110118025436.000|CC1|    Allergic reactions, such    
20110118025436.000|20110118025438.000|CC1|  as tongue or throat swelling, 
20110118025438.000|20110118025440.000|CC1| occur rarely and may be fatal. 
20110118025440.000|20110118025440.000|CC1|    Side effects may include

20110118025442.000|20110118025442.000|CC1|            dizziness
